Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is immediately followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that occurs before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of variants where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appears more than once
Percentage of cases containing SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that result in a revision decision (SW-EIC Major Revision or SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in comparison to RW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are followed within 7 days by any reviewer assignment attempt (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences that are not followed by any SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in rejected manuscripts (ending with SW-EIC Reject or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit) versus accepted ones
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Ratio of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to total checklist-related activities (e.g., SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion, SW-Checklist Completed)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection per month to identify temporal patterns in reviewer selection initiation
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
